name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora interacts with the audience during her New Year's Party 2026 'Dreams in Motion' concert, playing a penlight game and sharing her goals.
A musical transition plays as an on-screen message announces the end of the free portion of the stream.

subtitles.original: そして、2階席ー！
subtitles.english: And, the 2nd floor balcony!

subtitles.original: 1階席ー！
subtitles.english: The 1st floor!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、またペンライト遊びしちゃおう。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's play with our penlights again.

subtitles.original: 左の人、緑ー！
subtitles.english: Everyone on the left, change to green!

subtitles.original: 右の人は、じゃあ、オレンジ！
subtitles.english: How about everyone on the right... change to orange!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、真ん中は青ー！
subtitles.english: And everyone in the center, change to blue!

subtitles.original: うわー、綺麗だー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's beautiful!

subtitles.original: みんな、今回はね、こんな感じで、みんなも演出に参加しちゃうライブになっているよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, this concert is designed so that you can participate in the production like this.

subtitles.original: みんなで楽しんでいこうねー！
subtitles.english: Let's all have a great time together!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんなも主役なんだー！
subtitles.english: You're all the stars of the show today!

subtitles.original: おいし、おいしいから...
subtitles.english: It's good... It tastes good...

subtitles.original: 夜はね、いっぱい動くと思って、まあ、もう動いてるけど、昼から飲めばよかった。
subtitles.english: I thought I'd be moving around a lot tonight—well, I already am—but I should've started drinking it this afternoon.

subtitles.original: 踊り一択。
subtitles.english: It's all about dancing.

subtitles.original: ガッツリ。今日、今年の目標、ムキムキになっていこうと思いました。
subtitles.english: Definitely. My goal for this year... I decided to get totally ripped.

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: というわけで、じゃあ、初めての人ー！
subtitles.english: Anyway, who's here for the first time?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、これ、拍手してくれてありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Well, thank you all for the applause.

subtitles.original: 一番最初のライブから全部来てるよって人いる？
subtitles.english: Is there anyone here who's been to every single concert since the very first one?

subtitles.original: うおー！ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Whoa! Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、みんな分かったね。初めましての人も、いつも空友様の人も、
subtitles.english: So, as you can see, whether you're here for the first time, or you're a long-time Sora-tomo...

subtitles.original: そして、昔から応援してる人、みんな集まって、みんなが、空友だよ。
subtitles.english: or you've been supporting me since the beginning, we're all here together, and you're all Sora-tomos.

subtitles.original: みんな、楽しく過ごしていこうねー！
subtitles.english: Let's all have a wonderful time!

subtitles.original: というわけで、なんと、YouTubeでの無料配信、あ、全然言ってないのに...
subtitles.english: And now... believe it or not, the free stream on YouTube... Oh, I haven't even mentioned it yet...

subtitles.original: まだ、来たばっかり、まだ来たばっかりかと思うけど、続きは概要欄から...
subtitles.english: I know you've only just arrived, but you can catch the rest of the show via the link in the description...

subtitles.original: えー、いえーいの人はどうしたらいいの？
subtitles.english: Wait, what should the 'Yay!' people do?

subtitles.original: ごめん、あ、コメント会場、配信会場の人も楽しんでってねー！
subtitles.english: Sorry! To everyone watching in the comments and on the stream, keep having fun!

subtitles.original: それでは、もう一回飲んでから行くね。水分も大事。
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll take one more drink before we continue. Staying hydrated is important.

subtitles.original: 助かる、助かってくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: That helps... thank you for the 'Tasugaru'.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲も楽しんでいってね！
subtitles.english: Now, please enjoy the next song!

subtitles.original: まだ、ほんのちょっと、足りないな、し、く...
subtitles.english: It's still just a little bit... not enough...

subtitles.original: 冒頭無料配信はこちらで終了です。
subtitles.english: The introductory free stream ends here.
